src_original: sarvatathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ |  bodhicitto vajra iva kulaputra sarvatathāgataiḥ sarvabodhisattvaiśca draṣṭavyaḥ |
tgt_original: sarvatathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ- bodhicittaṁ vajraṁ iva kulaputrāḥ sarvatathāgataiḥ sarvabodhisattvaiśca draṣṭavyam |

src_original: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra yāvanto buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu viharanti teṣāṁ ca buddhānāṁ bhagavatāṁ yāvat kāyavākcittavajrajaḥ -111- puṇyaskandhaḥ sa ca puṇyaskandha ācāryasyaiva romakūpāgravivare viśiṣyate |
tgt_original: tadyathā- api nāma kulaputrā yāvanto buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu pracaranti teṣāṁ ca buddhānāṁ bhagavatāṁ yāvantaḥ kāyavākcittapuṇyaskandhā ācāryyasya romakūpāgravivare viśiṣyate |
